<@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6> I fetched a HubDB table from my dev account through the CLI and now I'm trying to create a HubDB table in my prod account,
```hs hubdb create <src>```
And I got this error message: This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call

The question is, how can I grant permissions for the CLI?
That means your personal access key does not have the permission

<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/personal-access-key>

If you have the permission, you would see HubDB listed near your key

If you donâ€™t have it, first your user account needs to have access to HubDB.

If you do have access, then you need to deactivate your key.

Run the auth command again.

make sure the hubdb checkbox is checked, and generate a new key.

Paste the key into the cli when prompted to update it

Thanks <@U7SL518D6>
I'll try it and let you know
